select MT_CODE ,MT_NAME ,MATERIAL_TYPE ,SPECIFICATION ,UNIT ,UNIT_PRICE ,SAFETY_STOCK ,COMM ,STC_CODE ,UPDATE_DATE ,CURRENT_STC --,LEADTIME from MT
AND UPPER(mt_code) LIKE UPPER('%' || #{mtCode} || '%')
AND UPPER(mt_ame) LIKE UPPER('%' || #{mtName} || '%')
AND UPPER(material_type) LIKE UPPER('%' || #{materialType} || '%')
ORDER BY MT_CODE
SELECT MT_NAME as mtName --,SAFETY_STOCK as safetyStock ,CURRENT_STC as currentStc ,SAFETY_STOCK - CURRENT_STC AS safetyStock FROM MT WHERE CURRENT_STC < SAFETY_STOCK ORDER BY MT_CODE
